price: Oni govore: “Milostivi ima dijete!” Uzvišen neka je On! A meleki su samo robovi poštovani.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
